meta.job_title: Senior Engineer in Verification and Test

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and uphold test and verification activities for wireless communications systems.
Analyze system requirements and technical specifications for assessing overall test objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand engineering objectives and develop test plans.
Identify, analyze, and document system issues and inconsistencies in testing.
Design, develop, execute, and maintain test software using LabVIEW automation tools.
Review testing data and metrics to ensure conformance with policies and procedures.
Develop new approaches to problem-solving in testing activities.

education_certification.credential: BS in related engineering discipline or equivalent experience. U.S. Citizenship required. Ability to obtain and maintain US Secret Level Security Clearance upon hire.
